features: [Elegant and versatile design] - The Modern Home Decor Ceramic Vase combines contemporary design with Scandinavian art to make the perfect centrepiece for any room. Its coral flower shape adds a whimsical, organic touch to your home decor, while the donut shape makes it a unique and eye-catching piece. Whether you place it on a coffee table, desk or bookshelf, this ceramic vase is sure to enhance the beauty of your living space.

[Ceramic Coral Vase] - The Ceramic Coral Vase is inspired by beautiful coral reefs and adds a unique artistic touch to your home decor. Made of high quality ceramic, this vase is not only durable but also eco-friendly. Its intricate coral pattern adds a touch of nature and oceanic flair to your space, making it a striking centrepiece for a coffee table, desk or bookshelf.

[Bohemian Decorative Centrepiece Decorative Vase] - The Ceramic Coral Vase features a unique coral shape that adds a touch of bohemian flair to your home décor. The round shape and spacious interior make it ideal for creating a beautiful centrepiece for a dining table, coffee table or mantelpiece. Whether filled with flowers, greenery or decorative items, this vase will instantly enhance the bohemian vibe of your space.

[Elegant Black Ceramic Vase] - The Black Ceramic Vase for Modern Home Decor features a sleek and elegant black finish design that will add sophistication and glamour to any room. It is perfect for fresh flowers, pampas grass or any other decorative flower arrangement. The black colour complements any modern or minimalist décor and is ideal for those who appreciate modern aesthetics.

[MULTIPURPOSE LIVING ROOM DECORATION] - The ceramic coral vase is designed to be versatile enough to fit into any living room decor. Its neutral colours and unique design make it a statement piece in itself, while its functionality allows you to use it for a variety of purposes. You can use it as a vase for flowers, pampas grass or dried plants. Alternatively, you can use it as a stand-alone decorative piece or as a holder for pens, paintbrushes or other small items on your desk or bookshelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my favorite vase now.
reviews.reviewText: I hope to find similar vases. The undulating form reminds me of marine life. I am not sure if these are handmade, but they appear to be and then made into a mold. As a ceramicist, who is not in the business of mass producing, this would be a difficult design to reproduce by hand alone. The thin edging lends to how delicate this piece is. The panel pieces remind me of flagellates propelling themselves though fluid. Despite the fragile appearance, it has a solid structure. Just be careful and pretend it is glass. I can see how easy it would be to knock a ridge off with carelessness.The color of the clay is a beautiful off-white, eggshell color. I'm not the best at distinguishing different names for cream or white. However, it is nautral enough to match the organic nature of the shape. There are small flecks of natural material that I find complementary. You can not see them from a distance. It reminds me a bit of bread or pasta made of different grains.This has to be my favorite piece. The color and display matter have endless options. It will certainly be a conversation piece as well. How could you not take notice of this vase?! I would love to have the black one as well. Though the price is a tad steep for me at $28, I have to keep in mind that this is hopefully a vase I will have for decades to come. In this light, it is worth every penny. I wish I were still working in the studio because I feel inspired to make a floor vase that would compliment. I recommend 10/5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Attractive and Visually Interesting Vase
reviews.reviewText: This ‘white’ minimalist boho vase looks like a beautiful piece of hand cast ceramic pottery. It can definitely stand alone without adornment because of its excellent sculptural quality. It's just ... nice ... and interesting ... to look at, even all by itself.I noticed the interior of the vase appeared to me to be only partly glazed, although the listing clearly says that you can put fresh flowers (with water?) into this vase. You may want to test it out over the sink first.This vase can definitely be used with dried flowers and if it will hold liquid, a reed diffuser with essential oil would be lovely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous ceramic "Coral" vase
reviews.reviewText: This vase is beautiful! It has a rough texture like coral would. Very realistic, stylish, and would make a great focal point. Very well made. It came very well packaged too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and modern
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely captivated by the larger-than-expected and three-dimensionally intriguing design of this vase. It feels like real coral with perfect coloring, fitting seamlessly into boho coastal decor. A striking statement piece, it looks amazing with or without flowers. The modern texture and form make it versatile for any decor. Overall, I love this vase for its unique design and versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pictures do not do this piece justice. It's incredibly beautiful, like a piece of art. It's definitely got a bit of weight to it but it's not heavy; you can simple tell it's well made. I cannot wait to display this in my home

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars unique / curious design
reviews.reviewText: This is a very interesting design, wise. Larger than I expected and has a most interesting 3 dimensional design. Very snug in the packaging, thus it is very secure. Look forward to seeing what I can create with this vase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Coral Boho Coastal Vase!!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this vase!! It looks and feels like real coral. It has a gritty feel to it and the coloring is perfect. It fits very well with boho coastal decor. While it is designed as a vase, it looks amazing all on its own as an art piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful vase. The texture and form of this vase makes it modern yet it can be in any decor. It looks great with or without flowers. The glaze inside is not done throughout so I don't think it would be safe to put water inside. The size is accurate so is not big but a good size. Overall I like it.
